tool_description: Super easy to integrate and extremely affordable - pay as you go HD video conferencing web and mobile API - with integration support, custom logo and branding, HD video recording to your own cloud, live streaming, host controls, customization, auto-scaling, and much more.

api_list.name: Clan Meeting Video REST API v1.0.0
api_list.description: Clan Meeting Video API offers integration with a video conferencing service. API methods are available to manage meeting links, custom logo branding, and more.
